# description

**Instance Property**

A textual representation of this anchor.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Inspecting a room anchor

- **contains(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a room contains the provided point.
- **geometries(of:)**: Returns the disjoint mesh geometries of a given classification.
